channel.title: Need a good coder for a good server already coded it myself
channel.description:
I need a coder to help me with the coding I already build a website, coded the server my self, and am hosting it
I just would like help with coding in future updates and such.
please apply with- name: age: years of experience: programs you can use: any extra info that may be of use
the server is an advanced 317 server with 2 worlds everything as far as I know if functioning correctly but I know down the road there will be issues.
so im thinking in advance
I think the server will hit it off since I my self have played 100's of rsps's and I know the good and bad for the most part and have a pretty good idea on what people want in a server.
my Skype is:
Stenen.clark73 or Steven.clark73@gmail.com
if you want any more details please either Skype or pm me thanks
~stevo

item.title: Need a good coder for a good server already coded it myself
item.dc:creator: @St3vo St3vo
item.description:
@St3vo wrote:

Driman Rune:

Goodluck! And just fix the thread up.[/quote][quote=“drubrkletern, post:4, topic:527871”]i see well good luck anyways i guess

thanks guys I will when I wake up.
